Html:
Hi,

Just wanna know if PHPExcel can generate items like checkbox or radio button?

Thanks for reponse. (Don't paie attention of my bad english^^, i'm french)

This is unfortunately not possible at the moment. Not many of the features involving shapes are implemented, except for images. Hopefully, we can implement this in the future. For now, there is no solution, sorry.

Arf... thanks for anser

Does someone know an other solution to insert my forms items? another tool or a trick?
